name: Comatose
description: For some reason this Pokemon is always asleep and can't wake up. Still, it is able to understand commands and move just as if it were sleepwalking
effect: The Pokemon permanently has the Drowsy Status Condition but it is immune to its effects. The User can't be inflicted with Burn, Paralysis, Frostbite, Poison or Badly Poisoned. Moves and Abilities affecting Drowsy Pokemon still have an effect on it.
